about.details:
Incorporated in 1999, Prevest Denpro manufactures and markets a range of dental materials for diagnosing, treating, and preventing dental conditions and improving the aesthetics of the human smile. The company’s product portfolio includes materials for endodontics, prosthodontics, orthodontics, periodontics, restorative dentistry, aesthetic dentistry, and laboratory consumables.

The company's products are sold in around 75 countries and in F.Y. 2020-21, 60.24% of the company’s sales were from markets outside India. The company’s manufacturing facility is located at Kartholi, Samba (Jammu & Kashmir), comprising of over 27,000 sq. ft. area and an installed capacity of 200 MT p.a. for manufacturing of dental materials. The company is also adding another manufacturing facility adjacent to their current manufacturing plant in over 16,000 sq. ft. mainly for producing hygiene, oral care, and bio-materials products.

Competitive strengths

  • Wide sales and distribution network.
  • Comprehensive product portfolio of over 100 dental products.
  • Experienced management with strong domain knowledge.
  • Track record of robust financial performance.
  • Collaboration with reputed dental universities and institutions for technical knowledge and & research.

faqs.question: What is the Prevest Denpro IPO?
faqs.answer:
Prevest Denpro IPO is a SME IPO of 2265600 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹26.61 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹84 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on September 15, 2021, and closes on September 17, 2021.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Prevest Denpro IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Prevest Denpro IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Prevest Denpro IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Prevest Denpro IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Prevest Denpro IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Prevest Denpro IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Prevest Denpro IPO opens on September 15, 2021 and closes on September 17, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Prevest Denpro IPO?
faqs.answer: Prevest Denpro IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,34,400.

faqs.question: How to apply for Prevest Denpro IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Prevest Denpro IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Prevest Denpro IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Prevest Denpro IPO will be done on Wednesday, September 22, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, September 24, 2021. Check the Prevest Denpro IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Prevest Denpro IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Prevest Denpro IPO listing date is on Monday, September 27, 2021.
